pages.name: Cinderhearth Structure
pages.text: $(italic)Did it really need the Lava underneath if you already have $(c_orange)Ink$()? No, not really. But it looks so much better.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: Upgrades placed on the $(thing)Chiseled Blocks$() do not work automatically, but requires you to supply an additional type of Ink to the Cinderhearth. The higher the upgrades, the higher the consumption.$(li)Speed:$(br)Faster smelt times - $(c_magenta)Magenta Ink$()$(li)Yield: Chance to multiply the output for most blocks - $(c_light_blue)Light Blue$()$(li)Experience:$(br)Vastly increases experience gain - $(c_purple)Purple$()$(li)Efficiency:$(br)Greatly decreases Ink Consumption of the other types - $(c_red)Red$()
